discussion.p: The equal member function of istreambuf_iterator is declared const, but takes its argument by non-const reference.
This is not compatible with the operator== free function overload, which is defined in terms of calling equal yet takes both arguments by reference to const.
discussion.note: The proposed wording is consistent with with status TC1.
discussion.blockquote: Set to Tentatively Ready after 5 positive votes on c++std-lib.
